title: Personalized Science Learning Pathway Design: Simulation/VR-Based Self-Directed Learning Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Blended methodology course aimed at enhancing self-directed learning competencies in a smartphone-based constrained technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct science experiment procedures with 80% accuracy using VR simulations
Learners can generate three or more learning scenarios by designing task combinations from a personal learning path catalog
Learners perform two or more knowledge-sharing activities while exchanging learning path feedback using collaborative tools with peers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
